sqlMap.select: select * FROM dat_cartype t WHERE $qry$ LIMIT $limit$ OFFSET $start$
select count(*) AS counts FROM dat_cartype t WHERE $qry$
select * FROM _dat_car t WHERE $qry$ LIMIT $limit$ OFFSET $start$
select count(*) AS counts FROM _dat_car t WHERE $qry$
select * FROM _dat_driver t WHERE $qry$ LIMIT $limit$ OFFSET $start$
select count(*) AS counts FROM _dat_driver t WHERE $qry$
select * FROM _car_oli_record t WHERE $qry$ AND isdelete = false order by ischeck ,nos LIMIT $limit$ OFFSET $start$
select count(*) AS counts FROM _car_oli_record t WHERE $qry$ AND isdelete = false
select * FROM _car_repaire_record t WHERE $qry$ AND isdelete = false order by ischeck ,nos LIMIT $limit$ OFFSET $start$
select count(*) AS counts FROM _car_repaire_record t WHERE $qry$ AND isdelete = false
